summary: Employee Structures feature validated successfully at Settings > Company > Employee Structures. The feature allows creating organizational groupings with Manual or Automatic employee assignment. 8 structures exist in the demo account. Full CRUD validated: Create (3-step wizard), Read (View Groups + View Employees/Roles), Update (Edit wizard), Delete (confirmation dialog). Role Management integration confirmed. No dedicated workflow triggers or approval flows exist for Employee Structures. All 14 WOF items in the payload are Leave Policy-related (cross-contaminated) and not applicable to Employee Structures.
